raw_comment:
I notice that fossil fuels are still the most used electricity resource, even with the amount of renewable resources available in 2024. I notice that solar energy has significantly increased since 2000. Oil and Hydroelectric have stayed steady, and I wonder if that is because of their limited capacities as a resource or their accessibility. This applies to my community because the use of fossil fuels can impact the earth and our environment for years to come. 
name : "ENERGY"
ace_sentences: In 2024, fossil fuels are still the most used resource for electricity generation.
In 2024, many renewable resources are available.
Solar energy has increased significantly since 2000.
Hydroelectric energy has stayed steady since 2000.
I wonder whether oil has stayed steady because oil has a limited capacity as a resource.
I wonder whether oil has stayed steady because oil has limited accessibility.
I wonder whether hydroelectric energy has stayed steady because hydroelectric energy has a limited capacity as a resource.
I wonder whether hydroelectric energy has stayed steady because hydroelectric energy has limited accessibility.
This situation applies to my community.
The use of fossil fuels can impact the Earth for years to come.
The use of fossil fuels can impact our environment for years to come.
